summary: An email from defense attorney Bobbi C. Sternheim to Christian Everdell regarding arrangements for Ghislaine Maxwell's participation in a telephonic court conference scheduled for the following day. The email includes a confidentiality notice and the attorney's updated contact information.

persons.name: Bobbi C. Sternheim
persons.context: Attorney sending an email to coordinate Ghislaine Maxwell's participation in a telephonic court conference.

persons.name: Christian Everdell
persons.context: Addressee of the email regarding court conference arrangements for Ghislaine Maxwell.

persons.name: Ghislaine Maxwell
persons.context: The defendant whose participation in a telephonic court conference is being arranged by her attorney.

connections.description: Sternheim is arranging Maxwell's participation in a court conference, indicating she is acting as Maxwell's attorney.
Sternheim is communicating with Everdell regarding legal arrangements for a court proceeding.

events.title: Telephonic Court Conference
events.description: A telephonic court conference is scheduled regarding Ghislaine Maxwell's case.

keyFacts: A telephonic court conference regarding Ghislaine Maxwell's case was scheduled for October 21, 2021.
Defense attorney Bobbi C. Sternheim was coordinating Maxwell's participation in the conference.
The communication shows ongoing legal proceedings in Maxwell's case as of October 2021.
